member.name: CTL_ANY_SUBJECT_INFO
member.summary: The CTL_ANY_SUBJECT_INFO structure contains a SubjectAlgorithm to be matched in the certificate trust list (CTL) and the SubjectIdentifier to be matched in one of the CTL entries in calls to.

member.name: CTL_ANY_SUBJECT_INFO.SubjectAlgorithm
member.summary: structure containing the object identifier (OID) of an algorithm type and any associated additional parameters. The pszObjId can be set to NULL to exclude a SubjectAlgorithm comparison.

member.name: CTL_ANY_SUBJECT_INFO.SubjectIdentifier
member.summary: BLOB containing a unique identifier of the subject.
